name: Quali
description:
The result of a two month school project using Unreal Engine 4 for the first time back in 2016. 

The game is a 2.5D Puzzle/Plattformer where you control two characters, one in the form of a Shadow who can only move on other shadows, and Quali, a mysterious girl with an unknown past. 

Together they have to use objects in the environment and their shadows to help each other traverse puzzles.
